answers.answer: Hey,I have GD this pregnancy. BTW this is my second pregnancy as well, first one I had no complications at all. So now I am watching my diet and testing 4 times a day. And I am not on any meds since I am controlling my GD through diet. Good luck!

question: I am 29 weeks with baby boy #2 and my glucose test came back elevated so next week I will be going in for a 3 hour lab testing to confirm if I have gestational diabetes.. I did not have this or any other issues with my first pregnancy so I'm freaked out! Any have Gestational Diabetes??
title: Anyone have Gestational Diabetes previously or now?
